Parallels.ab: Y1.23 ≈ YR1.14; ≈ Y1.22 (in 2nd. sg. yezi ϑβā).

ratauuō vīspe mazišta ~ Y1.10, Y3.12, Y4.15, Y7.13, Y17.9, Y22.13, Y24.20, Y59.9, Y66.10, VrS27.34, VrS78.22, VrS79.15, VrS82.10 vīspaēibiiō aēibiiō ratubiiō yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō ϑraiiasca ϑrisąsca nazdišta pairiš.hāuuanaiiō; ~Y2.10, Y6.9, Y17.9, Y59.9, VrS81.9 vīspe aṣ̌ahe ratauuō [...] yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō ϑraiiasca ϑrisąsca nazdišta pairiš.hāuuanaiiō ; ~ VytS3.6vīspe ā tē ā ϑātuš tē ā ratūš yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō ϑraiiasca ϑrisąsca nazdišta pairiš.hāuuanaiiō yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō ϑrātōtəmō.
yezi ϑβā diduuaēša yezi manaŋha yezi vacaŋha yezi š́iiaōϑna... ā.tē aŋ́he fraca stuiiē ~ Y12.13 āstuiiē humatəm manō āstuiiē hūxtəm vacō āstuiiē huarštəm š́iiaōϑanəm

yezi manaŋha yezi vacaŋha yezi š́iiaōϑna ~ Y0.7, Y12.3 fərā manaŋhā fərā vacaŋhā fərā š́iiaōϑnā; ~ Y18.2, Y18.9 Y47.2, Y47.8, Y48.13, Y49.13, Y50.12, Y68.36, Y68.42 vahištācā manaŋhā hacā aṣ̌āt̰ š́iiaōϑanācā vacaŋhācā ~ Y19.17 aršmanaŋha aršuuacaŋha aršš́iiaōϑna; ~ A1.11 raϑbiia manaŋha raϑβiia vacaŋha raϑβiia š́iiaōϑna
yasnaheca vaɱaheca ~ passim in formula yasnāica vaɱāica (xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca)
